## AOnDestroy class

Provides a communication channel via callbacks which can be easily cleared &amp; copied.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AOnDestroy implements IOnDestroy 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IOnDestroy](./rc-js-util.iondestroy.md)
